item.title: “Shape of You is the most streamed song of all time on Apple Music, with more than 930 million plays worldwide.”
item.author: PopBase

item.title: ‘Shape Of You’ by Ed Sheeran has been revealed as the most streamed song in Apple Music history with 930 million streams.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: Apple Music has no songs with over 1 billion streams.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: Shakira has released her new single ‘Acróstico.’
item.author: PopBase

item.title: ‘RENAISSANCE’ by Beyoncé has re-entered the Top 5 of US Apple Music following the start of the Renaissance World Tour in Sweden.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: Taylor Swift becomes the female artist with the most albums to surpass 3 billion streams on Spotify. (6)
item.author: PopBase
